column1: movement straight away, seams away from outside off, left alone
good length on off, a bit of away movement, presses forward and blocks into the off side
gets forward and pushes into point
length ball on middle, blocked to midwicket
back of a length, can't get on top of it, rolls off the outside edge towards third man
length at 142kph and on leg stump, nudged into the on side
back of a length, straight, shifts back and defends
straight length ball, punches down to long-on
presses forward and blocks a fuller one into the covers
appeal for lbw as he gets down to sweep but he's struck outside off
pushed to mid-off
another appeal for leg before, this one seems to have struck him too high as he shifts back and attempts to whip it away
length on middle and off, defended back
back of a length, gets on top of it in the crease and punches off the backfoot through cover
gets a stride across and punches a length ball to point where Markram flings himself to his right and stops it one-handed
slower length ball, blocked
full on off, crunched to mid-on
full on off, punched crisply to mid-off
floated up outside off, comes forward and blocks
back of a length on off, shifts back and punches through cover
nicely flighted outside off, drags a slog down to long-on
full and flighted on leg, driven to long-on
full on off, defended
pitched up on middle, pushed down the ground
short of a length on off, chopped into the surface as it goes towards the second slip fielder
length on off, presses forward and gently pushes into the covers where Zondo misjudges the bounce and misfields
short ball, mistimed pull to the right of square leg
full on off, Zondo flings himself to his right to get a hand to the drive and half-stops it
length on off, blocked to point
length on off, 147ks, blocked to extra cover
pitched up on middle, gets forward and blocks
short of length, shifts back and blocks inf front of off
gets down to sweep and gets an inside edge that saves him. Would have snuck through to the stumps otherwise
shifts back and blocks into the off side
off-stump taken out. And Tahir takes flight and pumps the fist. Beautifully bowled. On a length, tossed up on middle and turning past the outside edge subtly to smash into off
slid across off, blocks off the front foot into the off side
full on middle and leg, pushed with a straight bat past mid-on diving to his left
shortish, extra bounce as it nips away outside off, knocks it tentatively down to third man
pushes a length ball across at 148ks, left alone

with Steyn's raw pace, it was only a matter of time before someone nicked off. This one's short of a length, a cross-seam delivery that nips away and squares him up with extra bounce. Edged behind to the keeper
jumps and tucks a length ball to square leg. Slightly astray from Steyn and duly punished
shortish, nips away late as he lifts the bat and lets it go
length on off, defended
appeal for lbw, not given by the umpire. No signal from the umpire, and rightly so.. got a glove on the reverse sweep to third man
blocked off the outside of the bat to the off side
advances down the ground and shovels this straight past the right hand of Tahir
googly, spins in, defended
gets down to sweep a fuller one from middle, can't keep it down but there's no one in square leg
back of a length, goes on straight outside off, left alone
too full outside off, gets forward and crunches it through the covers. Poor ball, put away duly
back of a length, left alone outside off
reaches out to a fuller one and drills it back off the inside of the bat
good length, angled into off, gets an inside edge onto the pad as he comes forward to defend
good length on off, blocked to cover who half-stops after diving to his right
back of a length, spins in from off, pulled to deep midwicket
full on leg stump, nudged away to square leg
pitched up on off, clipped uppishly to long-on
gets down for a reverse sweep from leg stump and it drops short of point
nudges a fuller one off the pads to short fine
floated up outside off, driven hard through cover, where Zondo can't stop it and lets it go through
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to drill a straight drive. Mid off intercepts
good length outside off, and he opens the bat's face to punch square. Rolls away to point
back of a length outside off stump, and the ball flies past Masakadza's shoulder
full on off, and he falls into a leg-side flick that drbibbles away to Phehlukwayo at deep backward square
full toss angling into his pads. Missing out on the yorker, and hits Masakadza's pads outside leg stump. The ball flies away to the off side

taken! Klaasen dives forward to snuff another Zimbabwean wicket. Rabada goes short, and this time Masakadza looks to defend off the back foot. The ball gets big on him, hits the side of his glove and lobs into the diving keeper's hands
full just outside off, and he takes a tiny step forward to defend
full on middle, and turning away from the batsman. He picks the turn, and drives straight down the ground to long on
full on off stump. Comes forward and taps this to mid off
good length outside off. Takes a big stride forward to defend, but the ball turns inwards, takes his inside edge, and then flies away towards the leg side. Not in control there
back of a length outside leg stump. Spins into middle stump, and nudged to the leg side
full on off stump, and defended off the front foot
length ball outside off, angling in. Fended off the back foot
back of a length just outside off, and defended off the back foot again
back of a length outside off again. Backs away, and punches to cover off the back foot
back of a length on middle. Directed at the batsman's body. Uncomfortably tucked to the leg side
full on middle, and he makes some room to punch this past the non-striker. Steyn, at mid on, has to give it a chase, but he manages to pull the ball back
full outside off. Tailing in slightly, and defended off the front foot
full just outside off, and driven away from the turn to cover
just past first slip! Full outside off, and spinning away. Tries to drive, but takes the outside edge to third man
full on off, and pushed off the front foot to cover point
good length on off, and worked off the back foot to square leg. They skip across for one
shorter on leg stump, and he milks this off the back foot to the leg side for a couple
full on middle. Tries to compensate for the previous ball, and he gets down on one knee to slog a sweep right over midwicket's head!
good length on off, but angling down leg. He clips this comfortably off his hips to fine leg. Shouts of catch it with a silly-fielder on the leg side, but the ball was played much finer
full on off, and he comes forward to push a drive down the ground to mid off
good length on off, and he chooses to defend with soft hands off the front foot. The ball pings off his bat to point
full on off, and he takes a step forward to defend. The ball roll backs to the bowler
full just outside off. Angling in, and he offers the bat's full face once again
back of a length outside off. Zips away after hitting the deck. He punches this away from his body to the fielder at mid off
length ball just outside off, and firmly punched off the back foot to cover point
length ball angling in, and he's uses his bottom hand to flick this right over the fielder at square leg. Nice swivel off his toes, and the fielder at fine leg has no chance either
full outside off. Hits the deck and stays low. Williams offers no shot
punched! Picks the length early, and he firmly brings his bat forward to smack this from the top of the ball, and past the infield on the off side
full and wide outside off. Slower from Phehlukwayo, but the batsman doesn't chase that ball
full outside off, but he takes a big stride forward and crunches a beautiful cover drive through the gap between cover and point for one more boundary!
good length on off, and jagging inwards. Rides the bounce and flicks to Phehlukwayo
good length outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover
short! And it hits his shoulder. Back of a length on off, and Taylor tries to duck, but he can't totally come down. Hits the back of his shoulder and lobs into Klaasen's gloves
good length angling inwards. Whipped off his hips to the leg side for a jogging single
good length angling inwards. Whipped off his hips to the leg side for a jogging single
full on middle, and spinning sharply into the right-hander. Smothered off the back foot to square leg
full outside off, and pushed off the front foot to short cover
full outside off stump, and he drills this flighted delivery to wide long off for a walking single
full on off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to play the reverse sweep. Struck well, but not fine enough. Intercepted by third man
full just outside off, and turning in as the batsman pads this away. Impact outside off, and therefore the appeal is quiet. Replays show it was bat-pad
full on off, and swept with the turn, but finds the fielder positioned at short fine leg
full on off stump. Keeps his eyes on the ball and defends
good length on middle, and going across the batsman. Punched off the back foot to the fielder at cover. Says no for the single
full and wide outside off. Going further away and left alone by the batsman
good length outside leg. The ball lands up near his hips, and he whips this square to deep square leg for a run
ramped! Back of a length outside off, and Taylor gets his bat up to a 45 degree angle, and then guides it right over the infield to third man
pulled! Back of a length on middle, but ending up outside off. Allows Williams the full swing of his bat, and he puts this away to the deep mid-wicket boundary
back of a length outside off, and nudged off his pads to fine leg
full on off. Turning away, and tapped off the front foot to the bowler
full on leg, and worked off his legs to the fielder at short midwicket. No chance of a single
full just outside off, and he backs away to cut. Dribbles away to point
good length outside off. Turns into the left-hander, and he uncomfortably drives back to Duminy
flighted, and lands right at the base of off stump. Defended off the back foot
full on middle, and the drilled cover drive is well stopped by the diving Markram at cover. <B>Maiden</b
worked away off the hips to deep backward square leg
back of a length on off, stands tall and blocks to mid-off
fires it full on the pads, flicked away to square leg
short and rising outside off, arches out of the way
tries to loft this length ball but the bat turns in his handle and he chips it to sweeper cover but the ball <b>drops short of the fielder running in
fullish, seaming away, left alone
comes forward and pushes this fuller one back
gets some width and he slaps this short ball to the left of sweeper cover
back of a length, spinning towards off, punched to long-on
pitched up on middle and leg, pushed back
shifts back to a length ball and blocks
length ball that spins in and hits the thigh pad
worked away to long-on
ah, what happened there? Nicely flighted and he tries to reverse sweep but the ball sneaks past beneath the bat and goes past the stumps
pushed down to long-on
flighted outside off, blocked
pitched up outside off, pushed back
flighted outside off, just a tad overpitched and he drives this through the covers
finds short third man with this reverse sweep
full toss, driven down to long-off
tries to advance and loft it over but doesn't meet the pitch and chips it just over mid-off
punched into the on side
slides across a fuller one that's driven to sweeper cover
full slider on leg stump, gets down and guides a sweep to deep fine leg
length, spins away, shuffles and drops it into the covers
length ball, spinning into middle, tucked to midwicket
back of a length, spins away, punched to the right of sweeper cover
offers up room outside off and he capitalises by slog sweeping through deep midwicket
length, spins away, blocked
length, spins away, tucked against the turn to midwicket
pitched up on middle, flicked between long-on and midwicket
length, spins away, gets an inside edge to the pad as he tries to tuck it away
full outside off, driven to the left of point
reverse swept to short third man
flighted on middle, driven to long-off

spins past the outside edge after drawing him forward. And has the backfoot come off? Stumping referred upstairs. Oh, that's gone. The foot is in the air, and he has slid it back in but the bails have been whipped off a fraction of a second before. He's gone here. End of a big stand
pitched up outside off, front-foot defense
pushes between cover and point for one
back of a length, spins in, tucked to deep square leg
length, spins away from off, blocked to cover
pitched up outside off, pushed back to the bowler's right
pushes away from the body and gets an outside edge to short third man
full, reaches out after it turns and gets beaten
pulled from outside off and drags it into the gap at deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, pulled along the ground to deep midwicket for his fifty
edged and short of slip. Faf lands on the right shoulder. That's the one that was hurt. Gets down to try and grab it but it just falls in front
pushes a fullish length ball back
tucks a back of a length ball off the pads to deep square leg
length outside off, pushed through the covers
short of a length, tucked to midwicket
length on off, blocked
short of length, backs away and finds cover with his cut
pitched up on off, pushed back
floated across off, pushed into cover
spins the other way, the wrong'un, stays back and opens the face through backward point
fuller of a length, gets down and reverse-sweeps through backward point
lets this length ball spin and knocks it to point
length on leg stump, pulled one-bounce to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off. Goes past Moor's shoulders and into the safe hands of the keeper
length ball outside off, but swinging inwards. Firmly defended off the front foot
full outside off, and angling into off stump. Takes a firm stride forward and defends. 143kph
length ball on the fourth-stump line outside off stump. Opens the bat's face, and steers a back-foot drive to point
decks this short. Lands on middle, and gets big on the batsman's body. but he rides the bounce, and blocks off the back foot
swing and a miss. Full outside off, and he goes for a wild swing to score some runs. Can't connect with the cover drive at all. Maiden
slog swept into the deep midwicket boundary. Full on off, and he sweeps this with the spin over the leg side. Lands just short of the boundary
good length on off. Spinning away, and he makes room to cut. Bottom-edges the shot towards the off side
full on off, and he goes onto the back foot for a firm punch to cover
good length outside off, and he flat-bats an innocuous shot down to long off for a walking single
good length on leg stump, and turning further down leg. He whips this off his pads to short fine leg, but can't pinch the single
smacked over deep midwicket! Tossed up on off, and Moor joins in on the fun. Slog-sweeps across the line, and manages to clear the fielder in the deep. Delightful way to get to the team 150
good length on middle, and punched off the back foot. But it takes the outside edge and runs down to third man
good length outside off, but tailing inwards. Fended off the back foot to cover

ramped to first slip! Pure catching practice there. Good length ball angling in, and he tries to lift this over slip. Not off the bat's middle and flying through fast as well. Hendricks takes a small leap, puts his hand up and takes an excellent catch to get Moor's wicket
good length just outside off, and at 145kph. Uncomfortably defended off the back foot
full and straight on off stump. Forces Chigumbura to cover his off stump, and meet the ball with the bat's full face
aimed at his toes, and this full-pitched delivery lands right on off stump. Chigumbura shuffles and gets his bat down, right in time to wedge the ball away to the leg side
lands full on off, and turning away. Pushed off the front foot to cover
good length outside off, and he cuts this off the back foot to the point boundary! Makes room, and keeps his eyes on the ball till the last moment
fuller. Lands outside off, and driven down the ground to long off
full just outside off, and he leans into a front-foot drive. Intercepted by mid off
full on middle stump. Spinning into his body, and shoveled off the front foot towards the leg side
full outside leg, and spinning further away. Tries to sweep behind square, but loses his balance in the process
full just outside off, and he's been lured into the cover drive. Comes off the bat's inside edge, and flies between his legs to the on-side
back of a length outside off, and Chigumbura stays on the back foot on this occasion. Defends while riding the bounce, all of it with very soft hands
full outside off, and angling in. Tries to check-drives, but the ball takes a thick inside-edge and runs past the stumps to fine leg. Lucky
good length on middle, and Williams opens the bat's face to steer this square. Straight to point, and the non-striker says no for a single
teasing! Length ball just outside off. Williams moves away to the leg side and looks to defend off the back foot. But the ball moves away slightly, and flies past his outside edge to the keeper

taken on the followthrough! Williams wears a disappointed look. Length ball on middle, and he tries to work it towards the leg side. it hits the top-half of his bat, and pops right up towards the non-striker's direction. Rabada spots that early and sprints across to the leg side, and then stretches forward while running to complete another soft catch
full just outside off stump. Tiripano meets this on the front foot, and pushes a drive to point
quick and full, but lands outside leg. Tries to sweep, but misses. Sharp collection from Klaasen
flighted full on off, and this is pushed to cover. The non-striker's already off for the run, but the batsman asks him to return
full outside off. It's the wrong'un that turns into the right hander. Defended off the front foot
full toss just outside off, and his straight drive is athletically stopped by Tahir diving to his right
full on off, and he smothers a front-foot defense to point
flatter. Lands on length and skids through. Punched off the back foot to cover
flighted on off stump, and the ball is caressed square to the sweeper fielder on the off side
wayward! Attempts the yorker, but this lands beyond the batsman after going down leg. Klaasen dives to his left and ensures that doesn't go for byes
full outside off, and skidding through. Sticks his bat out, but the ball's gone past him before he could notice
good length just outside off, and blocked off the back foot
full on middle, and that's been clipped off his toes past the midwicket fielder! Sweet timing off the bat, and the delivery whizzes away for a much-needed boundary
back of a length outside off, and that's been left alone by the batsman
good length just outside off, and he pushes this off the front foot to cover. They race away for a run
back of a length on middle stump, and going down leg stump. But the umpire reckons it's not a wide, because the ball was near the batsman's playing region
back of a length outside off, and he defends off the back foot
full just outside off, and driven off the front foot to cover. Played with the turn this time
full on leg stump, and clipped off his toes to the leg side. They choose not to take the run
good length on middle. Turning away after pitching, and blocked off the back foot
the wrong'un! But it's pitched so wide outside off, that the offspin was expected. Defended off the front foot
slapped! Length ball outside off, and he backs away to successfully cut this past the diving cover-point fielder
full outside off, and he smothers the offbreak towards the leg side with soft hands
misses out on an extravagant square cut. Length ball wide outside off, and Chigumbura threw his bat at this. But the extra bounce takes it over his blade and into the keeper's gloves
good length outside off, and he steers a back-foot late cut to backward point
slower ball from Rabada. Full just outside off,but he waits for the ball to get to him. Blocked back to the bowler
sends the batsman ducking! Fiery, short and aimed at the batsman's body. Does well to drop his knees and get out of the ball's way
back of a length just outside off. Blocked off the back foot to point
full just outside off, and the cover drive flies off the bat's inside half. Rolls away to midwicket
full on leg, and spinning across the batsman. But Tiripano negates that with his big stride, and then defends this straight
length ball on middle that's skidding down leg. The batsman swivels, and gets a feather-touch off his flick, and the ball absolutely races away to the fine-leg boundary for four
full and wide outside off. The wrong'un turns in, and he defends off the front foot to cover
good length outside off, and he waits for the ball to come to him, before pulling this from deep into his crease. Clears the mid-on fielder, and it's running away for another boundary
full outside off, and pushed off the front foot to cover point
full on middle, and blocked off the front foot. Tahir finishes with 2 for 44
edged and gone. Slashes at the sight of width and the ball gets up a bit more to shave the edge and settle into the keeper's gloves
full on off, defended
length on off, blocked to cover
short and wide, slaps at it and chops it into the ground
short of a length around off, tries to run it down and misses
short of a length, pushes back and drops it to third man
gets down to sweep and guides it past short fine leg
full on the pads, clips it away and chips it past mid-on for four
loses control on this sweep and top-edges it to deep square leg, in front of the fielder in the deep
flicks a fuller one into the on side
now he unfurls the reverse sweep, sees the angle as it's slid across and just gets down and guides it fine to third man
blocks a fuller one into the off side
reaches out to a wide one that keeps low and goes to the keeper off the bottom edge
flicks a fuller one to midwicket
full on off, defended
tries to cut a wide one and gets beaten as it doesn't quite come on
flicks a length ball to midwicket
flays at a fuller wide ball and thumps it past extra cover stretching out to his left
floats a fuller one across off, defended off the front foot
goes for a big heave but can't get underneath it as the ball spins and bounces past the keeper and the first slip
gets down for a reverse sweep and gets a bit of a leading edge past slip
tries to nudge it into the on side but it keeps low and he barely keeps it out
another sweep, to a length ball this time, to deep square leg
reverse-sweeps this from leg stump to the left of sweeper cover
extremely full on middle, dug out to mid-off
opens the face to a length ball and runs it down to third man
advances and swipes across the line to get an inside edge to deep fine leg
swipes at a full toss and chips it in the air off the outside of the bat, and du Plessis at mid-off easily grabs it
defends a fuller one outside off
short ball, gets under it
full, clipped off the pads to deep fine leg
short of a length, seams away at 135ks, swings and misses
nasty bouncer, well-directed at middle stump, ducked under
short, fails to get on top of the bounce as he flays at it and misses
another short one, leaves him and climbs sharply, can't do much about it
short of a length outside off, guided to point

dropped. Very, very tough chance. Phehlukwayo sprints all the way back from midwicket, runs a good 15-20 steps and gets under it but it pops out. It was a cross-seamer, and Tiripano swung blindly looking for a big hit over the leg side
moves away from a back of a length, stays in the crease and swings and misses
now he goes straight over, doesn't make great connection but it's good enough. An off-cutter, slapped over mid-on
short around off, backs away and tries to open the face but makes no contact
short of a length, stays legside and opens the face to point
slower length ball, steered to third man
short of a length on off, punched to point
slower shortish ball, makes no effort to get close as he swings, and misses
short of a length, fails to get on top and doesn't get much room, top-edges a pull to the vacant midwicket
short, angling into him, pulls to deep square leg
shortish outside off, slapped down to mid-off
backs away but the bowler follows him with a short ball and he makes no contact on the pull
short of length on off, punched to extra cover
rolls his fingers over a length ball and Jarvis takes a swing and connects only well enough to send a catch down the throat of long-on
full toss on middle, pushes down to long-on and jogs down for a single but it sent back
back of a length, backs away and slaps it over extra cover for an imperious boundary
fuller this time, stays shifts back and tries to loft it over but gets an inside edge to the pad

in the air and taken. That's the end of the innings. Slower ball from Steyn, wide and back of a length, Tiripano has a flat-batted swing at it and the ball shoots up off the splice and goes to Faf at extra cover
good length on off, and Markram gets bat to ball off the first delivery. Rocks back and fends it back to the bowler
full and wide outside off. Swinging further away, and left alone by Markram
full on middle, drifting down leg, and flicked away to fine leg. South Africa get off the mark
full outside off, and shaping away once again. The batsman looks to drive but eventually pulls out of the shot
full on middle, but going down leg. Hendricks is happy to let that go
good length outside off, and he stands tall to punch through point. But the fielder gets down on both knees and stops the ball from sneaking past him
full on off stump. He takes a couple of steps forward, and blocks off the front foot
full on off stump. Right on the money, and defended down the ground to mid on
full just outside off, and pushed with soft hands to cover
full on leg, and that's been timed off his toes past square leg. Chase for the infielder but the ball's winning that race
full on off stump. Markram covers his off stump by shuffling across, and defends off the front foot to mid on
flicked! On his pads again, and he whips this off his legs once again over the square-leg umpire for another leg-side boundary
full on middle, and that's the best of the three boundaries! Just gets his front leg across to off stump, and then thumps an on drive past midwicket
full just outside off, and his front-foot drive goes straight to mid off. No chance of a run there
good length on middle, and he works this away off his hips to deep square leg.
good length outside off, and punched off the back foot to mid off
back of a length outside off. Much nicer line from Jarvis. Fended off the back foot
good length outside off, and firmly struck off the back foot. But finds the cover fielder
crunched! Width offered with a length ball, and he climbs into a superb square-cut off the back foot
full on middle, and worked off his toes to the leg side
length ball angling in, and clipped off his pads to midwicket
good length outside off, and cut square once again! This is a much better shot, in fact. Picks the length early, and slaps this rising ball from near his chest
length ball outside off, and the cut is mistimed towards the off side
slower one outside off, Markram lets it come on to the bat before opening the face to run it down towards third man
length ball, around middle and off, it nips back in sharply to rap the batsman on the thigh, an appeal for lbw but it struck him too high
length again, just around off stump, punched towards mid-off
straying on the pads this time, flicked towards square leg where a sliding stop prevents the boundary
back of a length on off, but tailing in sharply. Uncomfortably whipped away to midwicket
full just outside off, and he uses his wrists to nudge this square to the leg side. Man cleaning up in the deep
good length on off, and punched with the angled bat towards the leg side. Mid on gives it a chase
back of a length outside off, but coming into the batsman's body. He contorts and works this away to square leg
half-tracker on middle, and he has all the time to swivel and pull along the ground fine to the leg-side boundary!
better accuracy. Length ball on off, and punched to mid off
good length on middle, and clipped off his hips to deep backward square. Easy runs
length ball angling in, and he taps this off the back foot to mid on
attempted yorker that lands full on off, pushed down the ground to mid on.
back of a length on off, defended
back of a length on off, defended to point
back of a length outside off, waits for it to come on and punches past the left of point
short of a length on off, stands back and defends
fuller of a length, on the pads, flicked through midwicket
length on off, defended to cover
short and spinning away, cut to the right of sweeper cover
fuller ball, skips down leg
length, spins in, blocked towards mid-on
another erratic delivery down leg
short and spinning away, finds point with the cut
comes forward and blocks to cover
length ball that comes on with the arm, Markram rocks back and shovels it through midwicket
blocks a length ball towards mid-off
tossed up outside off, slashes hard at it and knocks it over point off the splice
length, spins away outside off, backfoot punch to point
full outside off, comes forward and pushes to extra cover
beautiful use of the feet, skips down and heaves this over mid-on. Steady head and good timing
clips a fuller one behind square leg
full, sliding into leg, nudged between square leg and short fine
just swatted through the covers. Down the ground and inside-out as Mavuta overpitches
full, spins away outside off, left alone
sliding fuller ball, turned away to square leg
pitched up outside off, gets forward and crunches it wide of long-off
tucks a length ball off the pads to midwicket
floated up outside off, forward press and blocked
back of a length, turning away, tucked to square leg
back of a length, turning away outside off, punched to long-off
pushes a fuller one to point
punches a back of a length ball back to the bowler
advances down the ground and shovels this after getting right to the pitch through long-off. All getting too easy now. Zimbabwe need a wicket
whips with powerful wrists to midwicket who dives to his right and stops it
length, spins away, punched down to long-off
full outside off, pushed to point
tries to close the face and gets a bit of a leading edge back to the bowler
full on off, drilled to long-off on the front foot
turns away a fuller one to midwicket
length outside off, punched to cover
length outside off, pushed to sweeper cover
tucks a length ball to square leg

oh, that's plumb. Given by the umpire Gaffaney. Nicely looped into middle and straightening down the channel. Markram closes the face and gets pinned on the pad. But, hang on, there's been an inside edge. No reviews, unfortunately. End of a very fluent innings
gets opened up by turn as he works it away to third man off a thick outside edge
now he gets an inside edge as this one slides into him
stays in the crease and punches a length ball to cover
full on off, blocked
spins away outside off, punched to sweeper cover
shuffles and blocks from off to midwcket
short, swivels and pulls to deep square leg
spins into him from outside off, punched to sweeper cover
short, not much turn, finds point with the cut
advances and pushes to long-off for an easy one
full on middle, defended
pitched up on off, driven to point
length, taps to mid-on for a quick one and beats the throw
pushes a fuller one to long-off
shuffles back and whips to the right of mid-on
back of a length on middle, and the pull-shot races away to the leg-side boundary! Excellent way to start the over
length ball wide outside off, and drives through the line to deep extra cover
full on off, and he uses his wrists to whip a flick to Ervine at cow corner for one
full just outside off, and the straight drive has been stopped by Chatara on the follow through. But he's overstepped
full on off, and he swings across the line right into the hands of Ervine in the deep. But it's a free hit. As safe a shot as any
beats extra cover! Full and wide outside off, and he uses his feet to give the bowler a charge. Simply checks the drive over the infield, and ensures that it's wide enough of the fielder in the deep
good length outside off, and tapped to point for a quick single
good length outside off, and he carves a punch off the back foot to Chigumbura at deep extra cover
full on off. Grips off the surface, and turns away. But defended with soft hands
full on leg, and pushed away to the gap between square leg and midwicket
good length outside off. He walks down the ground and taps this away to cover
good length on off, and spinning into his body. Tapped away off his pads
half-tracker outside off, and he smothers a cover drive to long off for one
good length outside off. Rides the bounce, and carves a square cut to deep point
short and wide, and he stands tall while crunching another square cut off the back foot. Stopped by point diving to his right
slower ball, and full just outside off. He's through the drive too early, and he inside-edges the shot to mid on
full on middle, and flicked off his toes to deep backward square. Singles on offer everywhere
back of a length outside off, and he mistimes a pull. The ball dribbles away to Tiripano at midwicket. Too late onto that shot this time
goes short again, but this time he gets into position early, and pulls along the ground to deep backward square
back of a length outside off, and pulled from the depth of the crease to deep square leg
good length just outside off. Pushed away to point off the back foot on this occasion
length ball, but too wide outside off. Allows the batsman to free his arms. Bunts it to deep extra cover
full on off stump, and that's a glorious straight drive from the captain. Shuffles across to the off side, and thumps this back past the bowler
good length on off, and flicked off the front foot with soft hands. The ball trickles away to midwicket, which is enough time for them to take the run
short outside off, and he tries to pull. But slips, and uncomfortably plays the shot to deep backward square. Drinks as well
tossed up just outside off stump. Tries to drive, but it's too full. Wedges it to cover
good length outside off, and cut off the back foot to point. The ball rolls away
full just outside off, and the cover drive has been crunched well. But Chatara's hard yards at long off saves a certian boundary
full outside off, and the offbreak is driven to cover
full outside off. Spinning inwards, and swept off his pads to short fine leg
straight to midwicket! Du Plessis was looking so good, but Mavuta has struck. Half-tracker on middle, and the well-timed pull shot picks out the fielder jumping upwards
length ball angling in, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
full on off, and angling away from the batsman. He shoulders his arms.
full just outside off. Meets the ball on the front foot, and pushes to cover
good length just outside off. Moving away from Duminy again, and he mistimes his punch down the ground
full on middle, and he gets onto the front foot for a firm defensive shot
almost a yorker on middle. Does well to shovel this back past the bowler's left to long off
length ball just outside off. Straightens after pitching. Pushed towards mid on
full on leg stump, and Duminy comes dancing down the ground. Doesn't quite get to the pitch of the ball, and therefore drives to long on
sharp turn! Length ball on off, but zipping in. Flicked off his pads to deep square leg
full just outside off. He tentatively comes forward to defend
full on off, and spinning away. Fended
back of a length outside off, tapped off the back foot to mid off
good length outside off, and tapped off the back foot to point
good length on middle. Duminy covers his off stump, and blocks

Mavuta is pumped! Takes an acrobatic effort at deep extra to remove Duminy. Full on off, and he tried to smack this over cover, but can only take a thick outside edge. In the air for ages but the youngster makes no mistake
good length outside off, and cut square to point
full outside off stump, and comfortably tapped past cover for a single. Man in the deep cleans up. His first ODI fifty!. He has an ODI hundred though
length ball just outside off. Worked off his pads to deep midwicket. Easy couple on offer
flighted just outside off. Comes down with the bat to drive, but mistimed to mid off
full outside off, and the square drive dribbles away to point
good length on middle, and that's been flicked away to the leg side with ease

sharp turn! Deceives the batsman, but can't find the outside edge. Length ball outside off, but spinning inwards. Klaasen punches from inside the ball's line, and the delivery sneaks between bat and body
good length on middle, and worked off his hips to the leg side
full outside off, and he leans into an exquisite cover drive through the infield! Excellent
good length just outside off, and defended off the front foot
full outside off, and pushed off the front foot to Ervine at cover
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot
slower ball, full on off stump. Almost a yorker, and worked towards the leg side
good length on middle, and worked away towards square leg for a single
full on off stump, and pushed down the ground to mid off
good length outside leg, and he works this off his pads to deep square leg
good length on middle, and he rocks back to pull over the infield. Lands just short of deep midwicket
full on off stump. Spinning into the batsman, and worked away to square leg off his pads
back of a length on middle, and pushed down the ground to long off
full and very wide outside off. The keeper can't hold on to it either, and the ball dribbles away to the leg side
good length on leg, and worked away to the leg side again
length ball outside off, slapped to sweeper cover
short of length, stands tall and blocks
short ball, swivels around and pulls, and gets a top edge as it sails over deep fine leg
short of a length outside off, jammed back to the bowler from the crease
full outside off, leans forward and pushes to the left of mid-on
good length outside off, drops it into the off side for a quick one
back of a length, tucked to square leg
full, slid into leg, pushed to midwicket
flicks a fuller ball to midwicket
length ball, punched down to long-off
length ball, defended towards mid-off
flicks against the turn and just chips it over mid-on
full on middle and off, pushed to mid-off
slower length ball, gets forward and blocks
back of a length on middle, defended to mid-on
full outside off, pushed out to mid-off
short of a length, slower, tries to flick and wears it on the pad as he gets the timing wrong
full on off, pushed out to the left of extra cover
gets down to sweep a length ball, not full enough, and is hit on the pad. Heading down leg
pushes a fuller one back
sweeps a leg-stump fuller ball and finds short fine leg
pushes back to a short of a length ball and blocks to cover
full on middle, driven back to the bowler
floated up on middle, driven to cover
short and wide, chopped to cover
full, pushed to the right of sweeper cover
advances but the bowler drags his length back. Manages to pull to deep midwicket
blocks a length ball to mid-on
full, angled into the pads, Hendricks tries to flick and gets hit on the pad as the ball beats the inside edge and pins him in front of middle and leg
pushes a fuller one to cover
back of a length on off, drops to cover for a quick one
short of length outside off, blocked to point
full, angled in towards off, pushed out to cover
short, wide, slapped away to sweeper cover
slower full ball outside off, leans into a drive to short cover
good length around off, defends to mid-on
stays back and tucks a length ball to square leg
gets down for a reverse sweep, don't think I've ever seen anyone try and fetch it from that far off and make such exceptional connection. Dragged from well down leg through backward point
in the air and falls safe. Tries to heave a fuller one from leg stump over leg side, doesn't make great connection but it droos in front of deep midwicket running back
fuller ball, eased down to long-off
rocks back to a shortish one and shovels a pull to deep midwicket
short of a length on off, cut to point
short and wide, cut to sweeper cover
carved away to deep extra cover
full outside off, driven to mid-off
short and wide, slapped along the ground to sweeper cover
slower fuller ball outside off, picked up early by Klaasen who waits and shovels it straight over for six
tucks a length ball to square leg
length ball on leg stump, punched to long-on
back of a length, spins away, punched to mid-off
looped up on leg, pushed in front of mid-on for a quick one
backs away and carves a punch to long-off
floats up a length ball outside off that's pushed to point for a quick one
full just outside off, and driven off the front foot to long off
full outside off, and he leans into a cover drive. But mistimed to the infielder
wedged! Full on middle, and he goes down on one knee, and plays this with the angled bat to fine leg
full just outside off. Spinning away, and pushed to cover
full just outside off. Spinning inwards, and flicked off his toes to deep square leg
good length outside off. Turn inwards, and fended off the back foot with ease
good length just outside off. Fended off the back foot
full on  off, and pushed towards the leg side
full toss just outside off, and drilled to long off for a walking single
full on off, and fended off the front foot
good length just outside off, and worked off the back foot to point
short on middle, but going down leg. Klaasen half-ducks and lets the ball go through to the keeper
good length on middle, and flicked away to square leg
yorker on middle, and drilled to mid on off the front foot
good length on off stump. Punched off the back foot to mid off
good length outside off, and punched to cover off the back foot
full just outside off, and he leans forward to drive to cover
good length just outside off. He shuffles across, and punches down the ground to mid off
full on middle, and worked off his pads to the leg side
good length just outside off. Stands tall, and punches to cover off the back foot
good length outside off, and carved off the back foot to extra cover
fuller, but wide outside off. Waits for the ball to come to him, and cuts fine to third man
wristy! Length ball on middle, and whipped away over midwicket. Lands in no  man's land
good length on middle, and he pulls in front of square. But it comes off the bat's toe end
full on off, and he comes forward to defend. Tapped back to the bowler
full on off, and carefully defended off the front foot to Ervine at cover
good length on middle, and pulled off the back foot to deep square leg
back of a length on off stump, and pulled off the back foot to deep square leg!
full on off stump. He covers his off stump, and defends down the ground
full on off stump, and once again defended off the front foot. The ball rolls away to mid off
good length just outside off. Defended off the back foot
back of a length on middle. He lines up to pull, but misses it completely. The ball goes under his bat
good length on middle. Going down leg, and worked off his pads to the leg side
good length outside off, and spinning in. Cut off the back foot, but bottom-edged to Mavuta
good length just outside off. Defended
full just outside off, and cut off the back foot to deep point. Enough time to jog back for two. His maiden half-century
good length just outside off. Tapped off the back foot to cover
full on middle, and driven down the ground to wide long off. South Africa 15 away from victory
slower ball, full just outside off. He walks down the ground, and swings across the line. Mis-hit towards the leg side
good length outside off, and the back-foot cut goes straight to point
good length just outside off, and he pulls this across the line to the deep mid-wicket boundary. Klaasen's set now, and he'll put anything loose away with ease
low full toss outside off, and he clears his front leg and then thumps a cover drive right over the infield! South Africa need seven now
slower ball, short on middle, and he toe-ends a pull right into midwicket's hands! Soft
good length on middle stump, and he lets it go through to the keeper
back of a length outside off. He rides the bounce to defend off the back foot

good length angling down leg, and he helps this ball along it's way to fine leg. They're coming back for two, and the throw from the deep hit's Phehlukwayo's shoulder at the bowler's end! He's in some pain here.
good length on off, and he pushes at this off the back foot
good length outside off, and cut off the back foot to third man
full on off, and angling away. He tries to drive through the covers, but the fielder at cover dives to stop the boundary
full on off, and tapped off the front foot to cover
good length outside off, and cut square to point. Stopped though
dropped! At cover. Full on middle, and the gentle push has lobbed into the air. Straight into Ervine's hands, but the ball pops out of his palm
good length on middle, and punched to short cover
good length on middle, and pushed off the back foot to cover. Still no run
good length on middle, and defended off the back foot
overpitched just outside off, and his square drive rolls into the hands of point
length ball outside off, and he steers a guiding shot to third man
to the keeper! Phehlukwayo goes for a duck. Length ball going across his body, and he tried to push at it. Beaten by the pace, and it takes an outside edge to the keeper
good length outside off, but stays low after pitching. Steyn defends but toe-ends it
driven straight past the bowler! And South Africa make it three-nil. Length ball outside off, and thumped to the left of the bowler
